Dependency.InternalNotes:
no file here!

go to: 
LogicalDependency_XVM_Main_Stable
and
LogicalDependency_XVM_Main_Nightly

including:
\_patch ix_xvm_force_dumb_color_scale_patch.xml



- Download the previous (referenced here as ‘old’) xvm zip file and the new one. It is recommended to put them side by side
- (old file) go inside the mods\versiondir folder and delete the folder called “com.modxvm.xfw”
- Copy the folder “com.modxvm.xfw” (this includes the wotmod files) from the new file into the old file
- (old file) go inside res_mods and delete the mods folder.
- Copy the mods folder from the new file in res_mods to the old file
- (old file) go inside res_mods\configs\xvm and delete the folders default, default_backup and py_macro.
- Copy the folders default and py_macro to the old file
- Rename default to default_backup
- Again copy the default folder from the new file to the old file
 - When renaming, the version info for the zip file name comes from a file in the root of the xvm download archive
- Done!

including:

- Download the previous (referenced here as ‘old’) xvm zip file and the new one. It is recommended to put them side by side
- (old file) go inside the mods\versiondir folder and delete the folder called “com.modxvm.xfw”

- (old file) go inside res_mods and delete the mods folder.
- Copy the mods folder from the new file in res_mods to the old file
- (old file) go inside res_mods\configs\xvm and delete the folders default, default_backup and py_macro.
- Copy the folders default and py_macro to the old file
- Rename default to default_backup
- Again copy the default folder from the new file to the old file
 - When renaming, the version info for the zip file name comes from a file in the root of the xvm download archive
- Done!

[outdated] wot1.7:\r\nhttps://koreanrandom.com/forum/topic/42018-team-wn8-%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B4%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9-wn8/?do=findComment&comment=438483\r\n

Mainainted in xvmDependencies repo.

Copy the pys over, ignore the following:
barracks.py
damage_log.py
hangar_stat.py
hit_log.py
math.py
modulesPanel.py
repairTime.py
score_panel.py
sixthsenseduration.py
str.py
tooltips_shell.py
totalEfficiency.py
vinfo.py
xvm.py
xvm_debug.py
Dependency.Author: Willster419

Dependency.InternalNotes: These can be found in xvm_config_NCO.zip from his website:\r\nhttps://github.com/AstaRom/xvm_config/releases/latest
2020-08-14: I updated script myself to fix it for 1.10. It will look different then from the forum post.\r\nSo we need to maintain it ourselves now. - Willster419

This dependency is set to every prebuilt in the database (except the default one) to maintain that the file is always up to date. \r\nPlease use the latest xvm archive to update the vehicleNames.xc every time a new tank was added to the game.\r\n
These are from the zip DD_Carousel_all_ui_scales_V202007052210.zip, in the folder "UI_Scale_0.8\Aslain\MaxData_icons"\r\n\r\n

Dependency.InternalNotes:
in friendsmarkers mod / promod / oldskool mods

We seem to have direct access to his mods without needing WGmods or his modpack installer.

One of his mirror download sites (https://promod.reidarty.de) allows https file browsing. For example, we can directly download from the following URL:

https://promod.reidarty.de/promod/1.9.0.3/
This package can be found in any package that uses this mod, from that developer's site
Dependency.Author: P0LIR0ID

Dependency.InternalNotes: 2020-01-29:\r\nDO NOT update to the latest version, it is sponsored by 'bait' and possibly contains malware

These files are originally from the english NA client. 

To Update:
- Download previous file
- Navigate to inside res_mods\versiondir\text\lc_messages
- Delete all files in that folder
- Open the GameCenter and switch to english language. It doesn´t matter if NA, EU, RU or ASIA client.
- After the language is installed, navigate inside res\text\lc_messages
- Copy all files into lc_messages folder in the zip file

We seem to have direct access to his mods without needing WGmods or his modpack installer.

One of his mirror download sites (https://promod.reidarty.de) allows https file browsing. For example, we can directly download from the following URL:

https://promod.reidarty.de/promod/1.9.0.3/

For this one in particular, you can get it from "promod.zip"

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1DIYfQwfD46KWA3xLvqONjj_i54SlYy3F0YKZUc_U3JU/edit#heading=h.x2kg0opxs8h0

Dependency_PMOD
This mod is a series of smaller modifications that improve the player’s game, mostly by aiming. It also has a statistics feature. The special instructions for this mod is to manually disable all features in the configs when the mod is downloaded. The config is JSON. for each json file (except single.json and multiple.json), there is an “enable” at the top, to enable the module. Each one should be disabled. (Set enabled to false)

If using Notepad++, using Ctrl+H will bring up a “Replace” window. In the “Find what” field, enter (“enable”: true) without the (), and in the “Replace with” field, enter (“enable": false)


1.46.1
rem improveIngameStatistic
Dependency.Author: P0LIR0ID

This xml file controls all the national languages inside the game. 
This may be modified by some sound mods. 
It’s the same as xml_creation package above. 

To verify: 
- Make an installation with Easy Crew Voice selector or Relhax sound mod
- Verify that es_mods\{versiondir}\gui\soundModes\main_sound_mods.xml is created

sets the following properties:
memoryLimit - 250mb
max_voices - 130
defaultPool - 36mb
lowEnginePool - 16mb
StreamingPool - 4mb
IOPoolSize - 8mb

sets the following properties:
memoryLimit - 250mb
max_voices - 130
defaultPool - 36mb
lowEnginePool - 16mb
StreamingPool - 24mb
IOPoolSize -32mb
copy the guns and engines bnk and pck files from "Gnome_Zorg_Banks.wotmod" (meaning you are extracting them out of the wotmod)
https://yadi.sk/d/b-fqQA923Mqvwk
Make sure to update the Force mods when you update this.
we only care about the battleAtlas folder, because those are lossless. Other lossy ones, like in the "not_icons" folder, are from the atlas itself, which we extract
its a patch: nothing todo\r\n\r\nand plz, DO NOT DISABLE THIS ON PATCHDAYS

Dependency.InternalNotes:
download the old zip from our server and exchange the old .wotmod file with the new one from [DevURL]:

mvi_battle_clear.zip -> LogicalDependency_MVI_BATTLE_CLEAR_noXVM_[WOTVERSION]_[DATE].zip


download/unpack/pack with a .bat:
https://github.com/Relhax-Modpack-Team/RelhaxMirrorFilesCreator/tree/master/NonXVM

download the old zip from our server and exchange the old .wotmod file with the new one from [DevURL]:

mvi_battle.zip -> LogicalDependency_MVI_BATTLE_noXVM_[WOTVERSION]_[DATE].zip


download/unpack/pack with a .bat:
https://github.com/Relhax-Modpack-Team/RelhaxMirrorFilesCreator/tree/master/NonXVM

download the old zip from our server and exchange the old .wotmod file with the new one from [DevURL]:

mvi_hangar.zip -> LogicalDependency_MVI_HANGAR_showAll_noXVM_[WOTVERSION]_[DATE].zip


download/unpack/pack with a .bat:
https://github.com/Relhax-Modpack-Team/RelhaxMirrorFilesCreator/tree/master/NonXVM

download the old zip from our server and exchange the old .wotmod file with the new one from [DevURL]:

mvi_hangar_clear.zip ->LogicalDependency_MVI_HANGAR_CLEAR_tier_noXVM_[WOTVERSION]_[DATE].zip


download/unpack/pack with a .bat:
https://github.com/Relhax-Modpack-Team/RelhaxMirrorFilesCreator/tree/master/NonXVM

download the old zip from our server and exchange the old .wotmod file with the new one from [DevURL]:

mvi_hangar_clear-all.zip -> LogicalDependency_MVI_HANGAR_CLEAR_ALL_noXVM_[WOTVERSION]_[DATE].zip


download/unpack/pack with a .bat:
https://github.com/Relhax-Modpack-Team/RelhaxMirrorFilesCreator/tree/master/NonXVM

UPDATING THIS MOD IS ONLY POSSIBLE WHEN THERE IS AN ACTUAL STABLE XVM

1) download the old package from our server 

2) (if you dont have them anymore, re)download all non-xvm MVI_HANGAR mirror files

2) download the “xvm-addons.zip” from [DevURL] and copy the file “lobby.swf”.

3) Use the previously copied file to update the "lobby.swf" inside the “flash” directory of the LogicalDependency_MVI_HANGAR_showAll_XVM_[WOTVERSION]_[DATE].zip

4) Extract the trainingRoom.swf from the .wotmod of the non-xvm-mirror-file (mvi_hangar.zip) and update the file from LogicalDependency_MVI_HANGAR_showAll_XVM_[WOTVERSION]_[DATE].zip

(MVI_HANGAR_showAll_noXVM --> MVI_HANGAR_showAll_XVM;
MVI_HANGAR_CLEAR_tier_noXVM --> MVI_HANGAR_CLEAR_tier_XVM;
MVI_HANGAR_CLEAR_ALL_noXVM --> MVI_HANGAR_CLEAR_ALL_XVM)

Special Packages Document:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1DIYfQwfD46KWA3xLvqONjj_i54SlYy3F0YKZUc_U3JU/edit#

UPDATING THIS MOD IS ONLY POSSIBLE WHEN THERE IS AN ACTUAL STABLE XVM

1) download the old package from our server 

2) (if you dont have them anymore, re)download all non-xvm MVI_HANGAR mirror files

2) download the “xvm-addons.zip” from [DevURL] and copy the file “lobby.swf”.

3) Use the previously copied file to update the "lobby.swf" inside the “flash” directory of the LogicalDependency_MVI_HANGAR_CLEAR_tier_XVM_[WOTVERSION]_[DATE].zip

4) Extract the trainingRoom.swf from the .wotmod of the non-xvm-mirror-file (mvi_hangar_clear.zip) and update the file from LogicalDependency_MVI_HANGAR_CLEAR_tier_XVM_[WOTVERSION]_[DATE].zip

(MVI_HANGAR_showAll_noXVM --> MVI_HANGAR_showAll_XVM;
MVI_HANGAR_CLEAR_tier_noXVM --> MVI_HANGAR_CLEAR_tier_XVM;
MVI_HANGAR_CLEAR_ALL_noXVM --> MVI_HANGAR_CLEAR_ALL_XVM)
